level.text: The streets listed in this section are designated as play streets.
On 10th Street, N.W., between U Street and V Street, between 11:30 am to 1:30 pm, on School Days.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: 17 DCRR ยง 40.118, Special Edition (September 28. 1970); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 2001 (February 20, 2004).
